dict.acceptation: 和，与；而且；于是，然后；因此；

sent.orig: Silicon Valley, and particularly Google, has a brutal variation of Gillette's razors-and-blades business model.
sent.trans: 硅谷——尤其是谷歌(Google)——对金？吉列(KingGillette)“剃刀与刀片”(razors-and-blades)的业务模式进行了野蛮的变革。

sent.orig: Bitmapped indexes are only useful equality queries, especially in combination with AND, OR, and NOT operators.
sent.trans: 位图索引仅对确定值的查询有效，尤其是拥有AND,OR和NOT逻辑运算符的组合。

sent.orig: And there will be more and more chances to travel in different countries.
sent.trans: And将会有越来越多的机会在不同的国家旅行。

sent.orig: SRCAND Combines pixels of the destination and source bitmaps using the Boolean AND operator.
sent.trans: SRCAND使用AND运算符组合源位图和目标位图的像素。
